DOC.detailed_description: Material Methods 1.Study prospective randomize interventional case series . Methods : 60 eye proliferative diabetic retinopathy ( clear medium vitreous/significant preretinal hemorrhage ) take study , 30 eye undergo panretinal photocoagulation conventional frequency double Nd : YAG laser remain 30 eye PASCAL laser . All patient undergo routine ophthalmic examination ( visual acuity , slit lamp , indirect ophthalmoscope , IOP ) well FFA/seven field fundus photo ( whenever require ) , OCT ( optoview spectral domain OCT ) , visual field ( Humphrey 30-2 SITA Standard 60-1 ) baseline blood investigation do 1st sit laser . Written inform consent take subject . PRP complete 2-3 sit 3 day interval one spots apart moderate intensity gray burn give arcade periphery . In case clinical significant macular edema modify grid/ focal laser mild intensity spot do . At visit patient assess visual acuity , OCT , IOP ( applanation tonometer ) . Patients follow least 3 month . After completion last sitting photocoagulation , follow-up one month 3 month . At one month follow together routine ophthalmic examination , OCT , HVF 30-2,60-1 do . At final follow-up 3 month HVF 30-2,60-1 , OCT do addition routine ophthalmic examination FFA do whenever indicate . Inclusion Criteria 1 . 60 eye diabetic patient proliferative DR include . 2 .
